issue.summary: Should Mm37 unplaced contig NT_112000 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_112000 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: TPF updated to include AC122792 on chromosome 1 TPF

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unplaced contig NT_166433 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166433 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: AC007307 was found to be sequence from the RIII strain that has an alignment to chr. 12. It will be represented in GRCm38 as an alt locus on chr. 12.

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unplaced contig NT_166438be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166438 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: AC140325 has been placed on the chr:5 unplaced TPF and a ticket opened (MG-3936) to tdetermine if the component is redundant

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unplaced contig NT_166441 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166441 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: AC170088 has been localised to Mouse chr:6. A ticket has been opened (MG-3935) to track the changes being made to the TPF to include AC170088

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unplaced contig NT_166442 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166442 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: This MGSCv37 Chr. Un contig (NT_166442) has now been localized to chr. 15 and looks to be redundant to AC225888.3 (RP24-317B20), a clone that was added to the TPFs after MGSCv37. It will not be retained in future assemblies

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unplaced contig NT_166445 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166445 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: The WGS insertion process will determine if CAAA01118462 belongs anywhere. CAAA01109560 and CAAA01152183 are now represented by clone-based sequence. The Chr. Un scaffold (NT_166445) as it stood in MGSCv37 will not be retained.

issue.summary: GeneID: 12735 (Clc), missing in assembly
issue.description: U67985.1 doesn't have a hit in any of the mouse genome sequences or to mouse EST or WGS traces. I'm not sure if it's expected to be in the mouse genome at all; apparently human has a Clc gene but not sure that other species have it. U67985 is supposed to be the mouse Clc gene though.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Can Mm37 unplaced contig (Chr. Un) NT_166451 be localised
issue.status_text: Oligos will be designed for Hybing experiments
issue.description:
Mm37 unplaced contig (Chr. Un) NT_166451 is comprised of WGS. The first and last WGS components are provided as acc1 and acc2.
There is no RefSeq annotation on this contig.
We must determine if this contig can be localised to a specific chromosome
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Provide representation for Rn45s 45S pre-ribosomal RNA gene
issue.status_text: AF441733.2 has been placed on ChrUn for the moment in order to provide representation for Rn45s 45s pre-ribosomal RNA gene in the reference. It has not been possible to localise this component to a particular chromosome at this point.
issue.description: There is no representation for the Rn45s 45S pre-ribosomal RNA gene in the GRCm38 assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Does AL669919.11 belong on the NOD/MrkTac chr. 3 TPF?
issue.description: Does GRCm38 NOD/MrkTac Chr. Un alternate locus component AL669919.11 (DN-84L11) belong on chr. 3? This clone is the sole component of the GRCm38 alt scaffold GL456050.1/NT_080256.1.
issue.resolution_text: AL669919.11 (DN-84L11) will remain the sole component of the GRCm38 unaligned alt scaffold GL456050.1/NT_080256.1.
